extendedInfo.description: Overview8tracks Radio provides the best music for any taste, time & place. Need a playlist for the office or the beach? For working out or making out?  Do you like deep house or dubstep, indie rock or classic rock, jazz or punk, hip hop or classical, rare groove or metal?  Weâve got it all and more. Choose from nearly 1 million fresh, free playlists, each curated by someone who knows and loves music. Enjoy millions of tracks uploaded and curated by people around the world.Whatâs different from other radio & music apps? â Freeâ No audio adsâ No listening limitâ Less repetitionâ Deep selections (something for every genre, mood and activity)â Unmatched music discoveryâ An interesting (and sometimes attractive) person âbehind the musicâJoin 8tracksâ global community of more than 5 million monthly listeners and tune in for free today!Features- Each playlist includes 8 or more tracks, along with a title, cover art & description- Listeners browse mixes in a variety of ways:- Activity or mood tags, like study, workout, party, sex & sleep- Genre tags, like indie rock, electronic, hip hop, country & jazz- Editorâs picks like Pitchfork, Vice, SPIN, Rolling Stone & Resident Advisor- Search by artist or DJ- If you enjoy what you hear, you can:- Favorite the track to add it to a wishlist- Like the mix to bookmark it and send love to the DJ- Follow the DJ to add his/her future mixes to your âmix feedâ- This version supports:- Android 2.1 & up- Both Honeycomb & Ice Cream Sandwich - Tablets, including Samsung Galaxy Tab and Kindle FireRegisterOnce youâve installed the app, register with 8tracks to personalize your listening experience. We only ask for username, email and password, or you can simply connect via Facebook. Once registered, youâll be able to favorite tracks, like or comment on mixes, and follow DJs. While we donât support mix creation on the app, you can head to 8tracks.com to create a playlist to share with others, using tracks from your personal collection or your favorites from SoundCloud.BrowseNow itâs time to find a mix thatâs just right for your tastes, whatever youâre doing and however youâre feeling. Tap the Home icon to open navigation options, then search for mixes by tag, artist, DJ or description. On the results page, add more tags to refine your search or sort the results by trending, newest or popular.ListenOnce you tap on a mix, youâll arrive at the mixpage, which includes title, cover art, and a count of âplaysâ and âlikesâ to date. The current track is displayed along with player controls at the bottom of the screen, and the star icon allows you to Favorite it. Like & shareThe heart icon allows you to Like (bookmark) the mix for later, and you can instantly Share it with friends via text, email, Twitter or Facebook.  If you donât like what you hear, click Next mix to jump to another playlist.FollowClick on a DJâs name or avatar on any mixpage to check out the DJâs profile, which includes basic info (location, short bio, Twitter handle, website), stats (mixes, followers, following), and a list of all mixes published by that DJ.  Click Follow to add a DJâs mixes to your mix feed.AccoladesâAlgorithm-powered âpersonal radioâ services like Pandora are all very well. But they don't feel nearly as personal as 8tracks, a music site where real people do the choosing of tunes.â- Time Magazine, 50 Best Websites of 2011âWhen it comes to finding new music, 8tracks has long been one of the cooler methods.â- MG Siegler, TechCrunchâ8tracks has slowly and steadily emerged as the industryâs reigning Internet mixtape startupâ- Colleen Taylor, GigaOMâA free, legal music service we loveâ- Peter Kafka, Silicon Alley Insiderâ8tracks takes a fun approach to creating custom mixes with the idea being that user-crafted music programming is more entertaining than algorithm-generated lists.â- Jennifer Van Grove, Mashable

reviews.title: Great app when it works
reviews.comment: Love 8tracks been using for over a year now. Recently upgraded to the HTC one and this app now only works when connected to WiFi but will not work over my data. I\'m not sure if it\'s the phone or the app? Any ideas.. UPDATE. 08/28/13 App seems to not connect to internet even in a full 6bar 4g area.. quite irratating because when this app doesn\'t work my Fratmusic app doesn\'t work either.
reviews.author: Justin Craven

reviews.title: Annoying Lockscreen Widget (on SGS4)
reviews.comment: When app is used/runs in background, shows a lockscreen widget that can\'t be turned off (no settings for this widget). Please fix this.
reviews.author: Albert Song

reviews.title: Cannot restart the mix from beginning..
reviews.comment: Well pretty much self-explanatory in the title-I cannot restart the mix from the beginning...I have read somewhere that your licence doesnt let You make this button but is there another way around?
reviews.author: Alen Sukaj

reviews.title: Plays automatically
reviews.comment: The app is generally good, but I had to give it only 2 stars because sometimes it can start playing automatically when you start it. This should never happen.
reviews.author: Jean-Marc Robert

reviews.title: Tracks?
reviews.comment: I would really like  it if we could see the number of tracks in a mix like we can on the site. The app is great except for that. Thank you.
reviews.author: xXsyrisdeevirusXx

reviews.title: new update & background data
reviews.comment: the new update isnt letting me listen unless im on wifi, kinda weird and i just got my phone bill i went an entire gb over my 3 gb and just found out it was because of this app, background data for like 2 weeks was 1.15 gb absolutely ridiculous
reviews.author: Stephanie Ignacz

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: It wil stop playing randomly. It keeps saying I\'m not connected to the internet when I can access the internet from any app buy 8tracks.
reviews.author: Dylan Thao

reviews.title: Love it when it works right
reviews.comment: Was great till the other day now it won\'t connect to any signal. Mobile data or WiFi. Until then I can only give it one star. Otherwise great app!
reviews.author: chris Dunker

reviews.title: not connected to Internet? then how am I writing this review
reviews.comment: the #1 worst problem this app has now is that it won\'t work because apparently im not connected to the Internet so I then proceed to play it from my phone\'s Internet browser (which shows that I obviously have internet). Same problem even if I\'m connected to wifi.  and then there are some days where I think had they finally got their act together and fixed their servers (or w. e. The problem is) and it works perfectly. then the next day - says I have no Internet connection again. literally makes app unusable
reviews.author: AngelzProphecy

reviews.title: Improved
reviews.comment: This app has gotten a million times better. Great app for listening to music. Provides a great variety of music. Awesome way to find new songs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New update won\'t work
reviews.comment: This is by far my most favourite app on my phone but after this update it won\'t let me log in or even make a new account, whats going on?!
reviews.author: Rosie Rivers

reviews.title: You can\'t make a mix in the app
reviews.comment: That\'s one of the main reasons I uninstalled this app. That was a complete downer.
reviews.author: Mariah Beckles

reviews.title: Lies
reviews.comment: \"Not our fault, we swear.\" It has to be their fault because I\'m on Wi-Fi surfing the web, and it still won\'t connect. Hmm...
reviews.author: Zachary Lovelace

reviews.title: Background service constantly running
reviews.comment: I loved your app but post your upgrade the app and a background service is constantly running on my nexus4. It leads to the music widget constantly showing when my phone is locked.  Fix the issue.
reviews.author: Deepak Baid

reviews.title: Lockscreen issue
reviews.comment: Used to love this app. But the new update seems to cause some serious issue. My lockscreen randomly shows a music widget and itz really annoying. The problem goes away once i uninstall this app. Tested on XperiaZ and Galaxy S4, both v4.2.2
reviews.author: Ahamed Ahsan Rashad

reviews.title: Says internet connection failed?
reviews.comment: I am on 3g and the app says that it cannot connect to the next song. The song does not automatically play after the previous one, because it says \"internet failed\" so usually I have to skip and wait for it to start. Very frustrating. Please fix!!
reviews.author: Sarah Segriff

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: I\'m trying to log in but it keeps saying network error or the username and password are incorrect what can I do??
reviews.author: Heba Mohd

reviews.title: Great app until most recent update
reviews.comment: This was doing great until I noticed issues with it not working when not connected to WiFi as others have reported, but I also have another issue. Whenever I have received a call, after the call ends and I\'ve put the phone to sleep, the next time I go to the lockscreen I see the 8tracks lockscreen widget showing instead of my clock and weather widget. This stopped after I uninstalled the app. I can only give it two stars now.
reviews.author: Phillip Walters

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: one of the best music apps out there. I it has a playlist for anything. You can think of and great tech support. to boot
reviews.author: Michael Kanary

reviews.title: Great app or Greatest app?
reviews.comment: YAY!!! They finally added the widget to the lock-screen! I\'ve waited so long for this. Seriously, this makes the app pretty much perfect for me. I have Google Music, Soundcloud, Mixcloud, Tune-in, Songza, Slacker, and Pandora, but I use 8tracks just about every day over the others. It\'s easy to use and has a cool UI. Thank you so much!
reviews.author: Anthony Sanchez
